verses.verse: בַּיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> In those days הָהֵ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> those אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [there was] no king בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel וּבַיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> and in those days הָהֵ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> those שֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> the tribe הַדָּנִ֞י <S%H1839><s%> of the Danites מְבַקֶּשׁ־ <S%H1245><s%> sought ל֤וֹ נַֽחֲלָה֙ <S%H5159><s%> them an inheritance לָשֶׁ֔בֶת <S%H3427><s%> to dwell in כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> had not נָ֨פְלָה <S%H5307><s%> had not fallen לּ֜וֹ עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> for unto that day הַה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בְּתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> unto them among שִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּנַחֲלָֽה׃ <S%H5159><s%> [all their] inheritance ס

וַיִּשְׁלְח֣וּ <S%H7971><s%> sent בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children דָ֣ן ׀ <S%H1835><s%> of Dan מִֽמִּשְׁפַּחְתָּ֡ם <S%H4940><s%> of their family חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H2568><s%> five אֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H376><s%> men מִקְצוֹתָם֩ <S%H7098><s%> from their coasts אֲנָשִׁ֨ים <S%H376><s%> men בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> men חַ֜יִל <S%H2428><s%> of valour מִצָּרְעָ֣ה <S%H6881><s%> from Zorah וּמֵֽאֶשְׁתָּאֹ֗ל <S%H847><s%> and from Eshtaol לְרַגֵּ֤ל <S%H7270><s%> to spy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> out the land וּלְחָקְרָ֔הּ <S%H2713><s%> and to search וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> it and they said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to לְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> Go חִקְר֣וּ <S%H2713><s%> search אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וַיָּבֹ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> who when they came הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> to mount אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H669><s%> Ephraim עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house מִיכָ֔ה <S%H4318><s%> of Micah וַיָּלִ֖ינוּ <S%H3885><s%> they lodged שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

הֵ֚מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> were near בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> When they [were] by the house מִיכָ֔ה <S%H4318><s%> of Micah וְהֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they הִכִּ֔ירוּ <S%H5234><s%> they knew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice הַנַּ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> of the young man הַלֵּוִ֑י <S%H3881><s%> the Levite וַיָּס֣וּרוּ <S%H5493><s%> and they turned in שָׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> there וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> thither and said לוֹ֙ מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who הֱבִיאֲךָ֣ <S%H935><s%> unto him Who brought הֲלֹ֔ם <S%H1988><s%> here וּמָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> and what אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> are you עֹשֶׂ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> doing בָּזֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> and what לְּךָ֥ פֹֽה׃ <S%H6311><s%> here

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to כָּזֹ֣ה <S%H2090><s%> unto them Thus וְכָזֶ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> and so עָ֥שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> dealeth לִ֖י מִיכָ֑ה <S%H4318><s%> Micah וַיִּשְׂכְּרֵ֕נִי <S%H7936><s%> with me and hath hired וָאֱהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> have ל֖וֹ לְכֹהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> me and I am his priest

וַיֹּ֥אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> And they said ל֖וֹ שְׁאַל־ <S%H7592><s%> unto him Ask counsel נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> please בֵאלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> we pray thee of God וְנֵ֣דְעָ֔ה <S%H3045><s%> that we may know הֲתַצְלִ֣יחַ <S%H6743><s%> shall be prosperous דַּרְכֵּ֔נוּ <S%H1870><s%> whether our way אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we הֹלְכִ֥ים <S%H1980><s%> which we go עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָהֶ֛ם הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest לְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> Go לְשָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> in peace נֹ֣כַח <S%H5227><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD דַּרְכְּכֶ֖ם <S%H1870><s%> [is] your way אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which תֵּֽלְכוּ־ <S%H1980><s%> are going בָֽהּ׃ פ

וַיֵּלְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> departed חֲמֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H2568><s%> Then the five הָאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> men וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> and came לָ֑יְשָׁה <S%H3919><s%> to Laish וַיִּרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> and saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בְּקִרְבָּ֣הּ <S%H7130><s%> that [were] therein יוֹשֶֽׁבֶת־ <S%H3427><s%> how they dwelt לָ֠בֶטַח <S%H983><s%> careless כְּמִשְׁפַּ֨ט <S%H4941><s%> after the manner צִדֹנִ֜ים <S%H6722><s%> of the Zidonians שֹׁקֵ֣ט ׀ <S%H8252><s%> quiet וּבֹטֵ֗חַ <S%H982><s%> and secure וְאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> there מַכְלִ֨ים <S%H3637><s%> that might put [them] to shame דָּבָ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> in [any] thing בָּאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> in the land יוֹרֵ֣שׁ <S%H3423><s%> cast out עֶ֔צֶר <S%H6114><s%> magistrate וּרְחֹקִ֥ים <S%H7350><s%> and they [were] far הֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> from מִצִּ֣דֹנִ֔ים <S%H6722><s%> from the Zidonians וְדָבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> and had no business אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> was no לָהֶ֖ם עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> with [any] man

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> And they came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֲחֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H251><s%> unto their brethren צָרְעָ֖ה <S%H6881><s%> to Zorah וְאֶשְׁתָּאֹ֑ל <S%H847><s%> and Eshtaol וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> said לָהֶ֛ם אֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H251><s%> and their brethren מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> What אַתֶּֽם׃ <S%H859><s%> you

וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said ק֚וּמָה <S%H6965><s%> Arise וְנַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> that we may go up עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> against כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for רָאִ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> against them for we have seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold טוֹבָ֖ה <S%H2896><s%> good מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> and behold it [is] very וְאַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> and will you מַחְשִׁ֔ים <S%H2814><s%> and [are] ye still אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תֵּעָ֣צְל֔וּ <S%H6101><s%> ? be not slothful לָלֶ֥כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to go לָבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> [and] to enter לָרֶ֥שֶׁת <S%H3423><s%> to possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the land

כְּבֹאֲכֶ֞ם <S%H935><s%> When ye go תָּבֹ֣אוּ ׀ <S%H935><s%> ye shall come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> unto a people בֹּטֵ֗חַ <S%H982><s%> secure וְהָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> land רַחֲבַ֣ת <S%H7342><s%> and to a large יָדַ֔יִם <S%H3027><s%> it into your hands כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נְתָנָ֥הּ <S%H5414><s%> hath given אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> for God בְּיֶדְכֶ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> your hand מָקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> a place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> there שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> in it מַחְס֔וֹר <S%H4270><s%> where [there is] no want כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of any דָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> of any thing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> is on בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> that [is] in the earth

וַיִּסְע֤וּ <S%H5265><s%> And there went מִשָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> from מִמִּשְׁפַּ֣חַת <S%H4940><s%> from thence of the family הַדָּנִ֔י <S%H1839><s%> of the Danites מִצָּרְעָ֖ה <S%H6881><s%> out of Zorah וּמֵאֶשְׁתָּאֹ֑ל <S%H847><s%> and out of Eshtaol שֵֽׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> six מֵא֣וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men חָג֖וּר <S%H2296><s%> appointed כְּלֵ֥י <S%H3627><s%> with weapons מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> of war

וַֽיַּעֲל֗וּ <S%H5927><s%> And they went up וַֽיַּחֲנ֛וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּקִרְיַ֥ת יְעָרִ֖ים <S%H7157><s%> in Kirjathjearim בִּֽיהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> in Judah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֡ן <S%H3651><s%> after that קָרְאוּ֩ <S%H7121><s%> wherefore they called לַמָּק֨וֹם <S%H4725><s%> that place הַה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מַחֲנֵה־ דָ֗ן <S%H4265><s%> Mahanehdan עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> to this הִנֵּ֕ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> behold [it is] behind קִרְיַ֥ת יְעָרִֽים׃ <S%H7157><s%> Kirjathjearim

וַיַּעַבְר֥וּ <S%H5674><s%> And they passed מִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> thence unto mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> and came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house מִיכָֽה׃ <S%H4318><s%> of Micah

וַֽיַּעֲנ֞וּ <S%H6030><s%> Then answered חֲמֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H2568><s%> the five הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H582><s%> men הַהֹלְכִים֮ <S%H1980><s%> that went לְרַגֵּל֮ <S%H7270><s%> to spy out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the country לַיִשׁ֒ <S%H3919><s%> of Laish וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲחֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H251><s%> unto their brethren הַיְדַעְתֶּ֗ם <S%H3045><s%> Do ye know כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> that יֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> that there is בַּבָּתִּ֤ים <S%H1004><s%> in these houses הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> these אֵפ֣וֹד <S%H646><s%> an ephod וּתְרָפִ֔ים <S%H8655><s%> and teraphim וּפֶ֖סֶל <S%H6459><s%> and a graven image וּמַסֵּכָ֑ה <S%H4541><s%> molten וְעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> therefore דְּע֥וּ <S%H3045><s%> consider מַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> what תַּעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> what ye have to do

וַיָּס֣וּרוּ <S%H5493><s%> And they turned שָׁ֔מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there וַיָּבֹ֛אוּ <S%H935><s%> thitherward and came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> to the house הַנַּ֥עַר <S%H5288><s%> of the young man הַלֵּוִ֖י <S%H3881><s%> the Levite בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> [even] unto the house מִיכָ֑ה <S%H4318><s%> of Micah וַיִּשְׁאֲלוּ־ <S%H7592><s%> and asked ל֖וֹ לְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> of his welfare

וְשֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> And the six מֵא֣וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men חֲגוּרִים֙ <S%H2296><s%> appointed כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> with their weapons מִלְחַמְתָּ֔ם <S%H4421><s%> of war נִצָּבִ֖ים <S%H5324><s%> stood פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> by the entering הַשָּׁ֑עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who מִבְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> which [were] of the children דָֽן׃ <S%H1835><s%> of Dan

וַֽיַּעֲל֞וּ <S%H5927><s%> went up חֲמֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H2568><s%> And the five הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H376><s%> men הַהֹלְכִים֮ <S%H1980><s%> that went לְרַגֵּ֣ל <S%H7270><s%> to spy out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָרֶץ֒ <S%H776><s%> the land בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> [and] came in שָׁ֔מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there לָקְח֗וּ <S%H3947><s%> thither [and] took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפֶּ֙סֶל֙ <S%H6456><s%> carved image וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אֵפ֔וֹד <S%H646><s%> and the ephod וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתְּרָפִ֖ים <S%H8655><s%> and the teraphim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּסֵּכָ֑ה <S%H4541><s%> and the molten image וְהַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest נִצָּב֙ <S%H5324><s%> stood פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> in the entering הַשַּׁ֔עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate וְשֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> with the six מֵא֣וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred הָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men הֶחָג֖וּר <S%H2296><s%> [that were] appointed כְּלֵ֥י <S%H3627><s%> with weapons הַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> of war

וְאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these בָּ֚אוּ <S%H935><s%> And these went בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house מִיכָ֔ה <S%H4318><s%> into Micah's וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> and fetched אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פֶּ֣סֶל <S%H6459><s%> the carved image הָאֵפ֔וֹד <S%H646><s%> the ephod וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתְּרָפִ֖ים <S%H8655><s%> and the teraphim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּסֵּכָ֑ה <S%H4541><s%> and the molten image וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> about הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> What אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> What עֹשִֽׂים׃ <S%H6213><s%> unto them What do

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֩ <S%H559><s%> And they said ל֨וֹ הַחֲרֵ֜שׁ <S%H2790><s%> unto him Hold thy peace שִֽׂים־ <S%H7760><s%> lay יָדְךָ֤ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over פִּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6310><s%> upon thy mouth וְלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and come עִמָּ֔נוּ <S%H5973><s%> and be to וֶֽהְיֵה־ <S%H1961><s%> with us and be to us לָ֖נוּ לְאָ֣ב <S%H1><s%> a father וּלְכֹהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> and a priest הֲט֣וֹב ׀ <S%H2896><s%> [is it] better הֱיוֹתְךָ֣ <S%H1961><s%> to be a כֹהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> for thee to be a priest לְבֵית֙ <S%H1004><s%> unto the house אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> of one א֚וֹ <S%H176><s%> or הֱיוֹתְךָ֣ <S%H1961><s%> become כֹהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> or that thou be a priest לְשֵׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> unto a tribe וּלְמִשְׁפָּחָ֖ה <S%H4940><s%> and a family בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel
